name: The Final Seconds
description:
You are the chief of the National anti-terror unit. When a rebel group that has been at war with your country for years resorts to terror tactics, you must protect your people. It is your job to work with your team to defuse all of the bombs that appear in the city each day, whether that means sending out your team to do the job, or doing the dangerous work yourself. This game will test your ability to memorize, manage, and work under pressure. The challenge is yours for the taking.

Along with the main campaign, and an exciting, memorable soundtrack, there are a couple of extras for you:
- A defuse mode to test how many bombs you can defuse in two minutes, one right after the next.
- A truly challenging endless mode, testing your abilities by throwing the maximum number of bombs at you each day, endlessly, until you're finally overwhelmed.

This game is based off of an entry created for the 43rd Ludum Dare competition.

Also available on the Google Play store for Android.
